node.doctext:
GTK+1.2 Catbox Client

Documentation to come....

Requires:

  • Gtk+1.2
  • libxml2
  • curl

compiles with: gcc ll.c xml.c callbacks.c interface.c support.c main.c http_encode.c `gnome-config --cflags --libs gnomeui` `xml2-config --cflags --libs` -lcrypt -o catbox

After compiling you need to touch cat.xml in the directory that its run from.

Very much beta at the moment, but it works. The login button writes a file called "cookie.txt" which just contains a userpass=[the username and password string from your e2 username and password].

To send a message you must have your username and password entered in the text boxes. if they are wrong then it won't tell you.

any problems msg me on e2 (elem_125) or e-mail ed@theflat.net

version 0.2 will be coming very very soon, with private messages!!!

This is my first program with libxml2 and gtk so any comments would be apretiated! (my code is also ugly and uncommented at the moment *eg*
node.title: GTK+1.2 Catbox Client
